title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The checkboxes in the table do not show any indication of being updated when the state is changed.
EB: A busy cursor should be displayed while updating the checked state of the table.
SR:
1. Open the software and navigate to the table with checkboxes.
2. Change the state of one or more checkboxes.
3. Observe that the table does not indicate any updates or changes.
4. Expect to see a busy cursor indicating the update process.
